channel.title: How do I give a custom item an emote
channel.description: Well the other day i added a bandos whip to my server and it hits like a sword andin te combat tab thing it has slash stab and black, i want to change that so that it hits like a whip and has the whip combat choices if anyone can help please say something.

item.title: How do I give a custom item an emote
item.dc:creator: @XxXxX_God_XxXxX XxXxX God XxXxX
item.description:
@XxXxX_God_XxXxX wrote:

then add it to the server files.

Items.java

Read full topic
item.source: How do I give a custom item an emote
